title: Statement by the Press Secretary Regarding S.520 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 23, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary Regarding S.520




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary   For Immediate Release  April 23, 2009 STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY  On Thursday, April 23, 2009, the President signed into law: S. 520, which designates the United States Courthouse located in Rockford, Illinois, as the "Stanley J. Roszkowski United States Courthouse".
